actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 92-181 (85 Stat. 383) relating to credit eligibility for public utility cooperatives serving producers of food, fiber, and other agricultural products.

summary.text: Provides that public utility cooperatives serving producers of food, fiber, and other agricultural products shall be eligible to borrow from a bank for cooperatives provided that not less than 60 percent of the voting control of the cooperative is held by farmers, producers, or harvesters of aquatic products. (Amends 85 Stat. 383)

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 92-181 (85 Stat. 383) relating to credit eligibility for public utility cooperatives serving producers of food, fiber, and other agricultural products.
